mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase_request( ngay_yeu_cau, sys_id_user, loai_yeu_cau) VALUES ( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{nguoiYeuCau}, #{loaiYeuCau});
mapper.update: UPDATE purchase_request SET ngay_yeu_cau = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), sys_id_user = #{nguoiYeuCau}, trang_thai = #{trangThai}, ly_do = CASE WHEN #{trangThai} = 'reject' THEN COALESCE(#{lyDo}, ly_do) ELSE NULL END WHERE sys_id_pr = #{sysIdYeuCauNhapHang}
mapper.select: SELECT sys_id_pr, ma_pr, ngay_yeu_cau, trang_thai, user.sys_id_user, user.full_name, loai_yeu_cau, ly_do FROM purchase_request JOIN user ON purchase_request.sys_id_user = user.sys_id_user WHERE loai_yeu_cau = 'NHAP';

SELECT sys_id_pr, ma_pr, ngay_yeu_cau, trang_thai, user.sys_id_user, user.full_name, loai_yeu_cau, ly_do FROM purchase_request JOIN user ON purchase_request.sys_id_user = user.sys_id_user WHERE loai_yeu_cau = 'NHAP' AND ma_pr = #{maPR};
SELECT ma_pr FROM purchase_request WHERE sys_id_pr = #{sysIdYeuCauNhapHang};
